# Drizzle

> Drizzle is a modern TypeScript ORM developers wanna use in their next project. It is lightweight at only ~7.4kb minified+gzipped, and it's tree shakeable with exactly 0 dependencies. It supports every PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite and SingleStore database and is serverless-ready by design.

## 遇见 Drizzle

- [开始使用 Drizzle](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started)
- [使用 Drizzle 和 PostgreSQL 开始](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/postgresql-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 PostgreSQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/postgresql-existing)
- [使用 Drizzle 和 Gel 快速入门](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/gel-new)
- [在已有项目中使用 Drizzle 和 Gel 入门](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/gel-existing)
- [使用 Drizzle 和 SingleStore 入门](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/singlestore-new)
- [Get Started with Drizzle and SingleStore in existing project](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/singlestore-existing)
- [开始使用 Drizzle 和 Neon](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/neon-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 Neon](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/neon-existing)
- [开始使用 Drizzle 和 Supabase](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/supabase-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 Supabase](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/supabase-existing)
- [开始使用 Drizzle 和 Xata](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/xata-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 Xata](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/xata-existing)
- [快速开始 Drizzle 和 PGlite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/pglite-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 PGLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/pglite-existing)
- [使用 Drizzle 和 Nile 开始入门](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/nile-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 Nile](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/nile-existing)

- [开始使用 Drizzle 和 PlanetScale](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/planetscale-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 PlanetScale](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/planetscale-existing)
- [开始使用 Drizzle 和 TiDB](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/tidb-new)
- [在现有项目中开始使用 Drizzle 和 TiDB](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/tidb-existing)
- [开始使用 Drizzle 和 SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/sqlite-new)
- [在现有项目中使用 Drizzle 和 SQLite 开始](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/sqlite-existing)

- [在现有项目中使用 Drizzle 和 Turso 开始](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started/turso-existing)

## 连接

- [Drizzle \<\> PostgreSQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started-postgresql)
- [Drizzle \<\> Gel](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started-gel)
- [Drizzle \<\> MySQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started-mysql)
- [Drizzle \<\> SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started-sqlite)
- [Drizzle \<\> SingleStore](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/get-started-singlestore)
- [Drizzle \<\> Neon Postgres](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-neon)
- [Drizzle \<\> Vercel Postgres](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-vercel-postgres)
- [Drizzle \<\> Prisma Postgres](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-prisma-postgres)
- [Drizzle \<\> Supabase](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-supabase)
- [Drizzle \<\> Xata](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-xata)
- [Drizzle \<\> PGlite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-pglite)
- [Drizzle \<\> Nile](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-nile)
- [Drizzle \<\> Bun SQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-bun-sql)
- [Drizzle \<\> PlanetScale](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-planetscale)
- [Drizzle \<\> TiDB Serverless](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-tidb)
- [Drizzle \<\> Turso](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-turso)
- [Drizzle \<\> Cloudflare D1](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-cloudflare-d1)
- [Drizzle \<\> Bun SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-bun-sqlite)
- [Drizzle \<\> Cloudflare Durable Objects SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-cloudflare-do)
- [Drizzle \<\> Expo SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-expo-sqlite)
- [Drizzle \<\> OP SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-op-sqlite)
- [Drizzle \<\> React Native SQLite](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-react-native-sqlite)
- [Drizzle \<\> AWS 数据 API Postgres](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-aws-data-api-pg)
- [Drizzle \<\> AWS 数据 API MySQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-aws-data-api-mysql)
- [Drizzle HTTP 代理](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/connect-drizzle-proxy)

- [Upsert 查询](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/upsert)
- [SQL Limit/Offset 分页](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/limit-offset-pagination)

- [SQL 时间戳作为默认值](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/timestamp-default-value)
- [Gel 认证扩展](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/gel-ext-auth)
- [选择至少有一个相关子行的父行](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/select-parent-rows-with-at-least-one-related-child-row)
- [将空数组作为默认值](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/empty-array-default-value)
- [使用不同值更新多个行](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/update-many-with-different-value)
- [唯一且不区分大小写的电子邮件处理](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/unique-case-insensitive-email)
- [使用 pgvector 扩展进行向量相似性搜索](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/vector-similarity-search)
- [PostgreSQL 全文搜索](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/postgresql-full-text-search)
- [Cloudflare D1 HTTP API 与 Drizzle Kit](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/d1-http-with-drizzle-kit)
- [PostgreSQL 中的点数据类型](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/point-datatype-psql)
- [PostGIS 几何点](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/postgis-geometry-point)
- [如何在本地设置 PostgreSQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/postgresql-local-setup)
- [如何在本地设置 MySQL](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/mysql-local-setup)
- [用外键为部分暴露的表进行数据填充](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/seeding-with-partially-exposed-tables)
- [使用 'with' 选项进行数据填充](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/seeding-using-with-option)
- [使用生成列进行全文搜索](https://drizzle.zhcndoc.com/docs/guides/full-text-search-with-generated-columns)
